We used the Jepson Manual (Jepson & Hickman 1993) for vegetative height, seed size and flowering dates and supplemented using other field guides (Smith 1952; Munz 1959), data bases [Ecological Flora Data base (http://ucjeps.berkeley.edu/efc/dbase.html)] and field measurements as needed.
